featureType.name: world_depth_view
featureType.title: world_depth_view
featureType.nativeCRS: GEOGCS["WGS 84", DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH], AUTHORITY["EPSG","4326"]]

virtualTable.name: world_depth_view
virtualTable.sql: SELECT world_depth.id, world_depth.longitude, world_depth.latitude, world_depth.depth, world_depth.geom FROM legacy_bathy.world_depth WHERE st_dwithin(world_depth.geom, st_geomfromtext('POINT(%lon% %lat%)'::text, 4326), 0.12::double precision) ORDER BY (st_distance(world_depth.geom, st_geomfromtext('POINT(%lon% %lat%)'::text, 4326))) LIMIT 1
